verbs.description: the poet [ARG0: every woman] [V: needs] [ARG1: to read rupi kaur first book milk and honey] is the poetry collection every woman needs on her nightstand or coffee table accompanied by her own sketches the beautifully honest poems read like the eve brazil milk arabi nusrat fateh ali khan greece rupi kaur cough ελλάδα
